mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knowledge_review_state(knowledge_id, current_level, current_interval, next_review_time, finished) VALUE (#{knowledgeId}, #{currentLevel}, #{currentInterval}, #{nextReviewTime}, #{finished})
mapper.update: UPDATE knowledge_review_state SET review_count = review_count + 1, current_level = #{memoryLevel}, finished = 1 WHERE knowledge_id = #{kid}
mapper.select: SELECT knowledge_id, review_count, current_level, current_interval, next_review_time, finished from knowledge_review_state WHERE knowledge_id = #{kid}
